revised_title: A Study on the Structure and Affinities of Palaeodiscus and Agelacrinus
tldr: The author investigates the structure and affinities of Palaeodiscus and Agelacrinus, two rare but important Palaeozoic Echinodermata. Through the analysis of their skeletal structures and comparison with other Echinodermata, the author provides insights into the relationships between different groups of Echinodermata and their evolutionary history.
